inventoryItems.name: Wallet
inventoryItems.description: Your wallet with ID and credit cards. Everything seems to be here.

locations.name: Bedroom
locations.description: Where you woke up with a terrible headache. How did you even end up here...

objects.name: Neverclear Alcohol
objects.description: A bottle of grain alcohol, a little on the strong side...

locations.name: Living Room
locations.description: A messy living room with party remnants and unconscious people strewn about.

characters.name: Pauline
characters.description: In the midst of a week-long bender that shows no sign of stopping.
phrases: The sun rising just means that the night is extra young. My liver yearns for a true challenge! Perhaps you could help with that?
Thanks! I'll put this to good use. Oh, by the way, is this your wallet? I picked it up from the floor last night and the picture on the driver's license kind of looks like you.

locations.name: Kitchen
locations.description: A kitchen with various supplies and a conspicuous looking man lying on the counter.

objects.name: Cat Food
objects.description: Dry cat food that could distract an angry cat.

characters.name: Dutch van der Linde
characters.description: Severely hungover on the kitchen counter.
phrases: *groans* I had a plan Arthur... a goddamn plan! Why didn't you follow my plan? We needed to make noise... *groan*
Thank you! You know, you remind me of someone I used to know. His name was Hosea...
Oh, your phone is missing? Let me call it for you. I think I hear it in the washroom!

locations.name: Upstairs Bedroom
locations.description: Another bedroom with some useful items and empty beer cans on the floor.

objects.name: Bobby Pin
objects.description: A thin metal pin that could be used to pick locks.

objects.name: Tylenol
objects.description: Pain relief medication for headaches of, let's say, various origins.

locations.name: Attic
locations.description: A dusty attic with old furniture and elegant silk curtains by the window.

characters.name: Ivanovich
characters.description: Tangled in the attic window's curtains.
phrases: Man that damn cat chased me all the way into the attic last night, and somehow I got tangled in these curtains!
Free at last! Man, I have a horrid headache. If you need something to take for that headache you probably have, I'd check the upstairs bedroom.

locations.name: Basement
locations.description: A dark basement that has somehow escaped the worst of the party's chaos.

characters.name: Fluffy Princess Sunshine Sparkles
characters.description: An angry cat with your car keys.
phrases: Fluffy drops the keys and runs toward the food! This is your chance!

locations.name: Washroom
locations.description: A locked washroom. There is some interesting graffiti on it that you swear wasn't there the night before...
